Domains¶

Domains let the operator to add domain resources that can be use in the C2 deployment. Operators can list them to see if they are in use by any infraestructure already with the attribute active

List Domain Info/Remove: Domains/SaaS --> example.xyz

Add New domain: Domains/SaaS --> Add Domain

Domain Status/Remove¶

Godaddy¶

Keys –> godaddykeys

Gmail¶

  • How I get my gmail connected App Credentials?
    • Create gmail Account
    • Follow instructions –> goquickstart
    • Put both credentials.json and token.json Strings

Note

You need to specify the following gmail app access google.ConfigFromJSON(b, gmail.GmailModifyScope)
